channel.title: Clojure on Peter Theobald
channel.description: Recent content in Clojure on Peter Theobald

item.title: Ghost Solver - Now in Clojure
item.description: My previous post was about a Python program to calculate the moves to guarantee a win in the puzzle word game ‘Ghost’. The algorithm was naturally recursive and felt ‘LISPy’. @pdlug has been telling me how writing in Clojure will expand my mind, make me more productive and hem my pants so this week I learned just enough Clojure (I already knew LISP) to re-write the Ghost game solver in Clojure.
